iso8601UTC.description: The date value in ISO 8601 format. The timezone is always UTC. (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)

NetworkInterface.description: The container for the network interface.

properties.name: ErrorCode
properties.description: The failure code, if any, for a create or delete endpoint operation.

type.description: The failure code, if any, for a create or delete endpoint operation.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: Additional error details describing the endpoint failure and recommended action.

type.description: Additional error details describing the endpoint failure and recommended action.

properties.name: OutpostId
properties.description: The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.

type.description: The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.

properties.name: SecurityGroupId
properties.description: The ID of the security group to use with the endpoint.

type.description: The ID of the security group to use with the endpoint.

properties.name: SubnetId
properties.description: The ID of the subnet in the selected VPC. The subnet must belong to the Outpost.

type.description: The ID of the subnet in the selected VPC. The subnet must belong to the Outpost.

properties.name: AccessType
properties.description: The type of access for the on-premise network connectivity for the Outpost endpoint. To access endpoint from an on-premises network, you must specify the access type and provide the customer owned Ipv4 pool.

type.description: The type of access for the on-premise network connectivity for the Outpost endpoint. To access endpoint from an on-premises network, you must specify the access type and provide the customer owned Ipv4 pool.

properties.name: CustomerOwnedIpv4Pool
properties.description: The ID of the customer-owned IPv4 pool for the Endpoint. IP addresses will be allocated from this pool for the endpoint.

type.description: The ID of the customer-owned IPv4 pool for the Endpoint. IP addresses will be allocated from this pool for the endpoint.

properties.name: FailedReason
properties.description: The failure reason, if any, for a create or delete endpoint operation.

type.description: The failure reason, if any, for a create or delete endpoint operation.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint.

properties.name: CidrBlock
properties.description: The VPC CIDR committed by this endpoint.

type.description: The VPC CIDR committed by this endpoint.

properties.name: CreationTime
properties.description: The time the endpoint was created.

type.description: The time the endpoint was created.

properties.name: NetworkInterfaces
properties.description: The network interfaces of the endpoint.

type.description: The network interfaces of the endpoint.
